entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kelowna
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kelowna Airport 08:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 600 metres near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
